name: nneoiALTV

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wb(wcel(c0, ceven), wn(wcel(c0, codd))), wcel(c0, cn))
stmt.pretty: ax-mp((c0 ∈ Even ↔ ¬ c0 ∈ Odd), c0 ∈ ℕ)

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, ceven), wn(wcel(c0, codd)))
-| wcel(c0, cn)
-| wi(wcel(c0, cn), wb(wcel(c0, ceven), wn(wcel(c0, codd))))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ Even ↔ ¬ c0 ∈ Odd)
⊣ c0 ∈ ℕ
⊣ (c0 ∈ ℕ →(c0 ∈ Even ↔ ¬ c0 ∈ Odd))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, ceven), wn(wcel(c0, codd)))
-| wcel(c0, cn)
-| wi(wcel(c0, cn), wb(wcel(c0, ceven), wn(wcel(c0, codd))))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ Even ↔ ¬ c0 ∈ Odd)
⊣ c0 ∈ ℕ
⊣ (c0 ∈ ℕ →(c0 ∈ Even ↔ ¬ c0 ∈ Odd))

body.origin: |- wi(wcel(c0, cn), wb(wcel(c0, ceven), wn(wcel(c0, codd))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, ceven), wn(wcel(c0, codd)))
-| wcel(c0, cn)

comment: A positive integer is even or odd but not both. (Contributed by NM, 20-Aug-2001.) (Revised by AV, 19-Jun-2020.)
